kw.name: Open Slack In Browser And Login As Guest
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

test.name: Use Slash Command In Guest Channel

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text '/lindalistaa tänään' into text field '//div[@data-qa='message_input']/div'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.arg: This command can't be used by guests in this workspace.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element '(//div[@class='c-virtual_list__scroll_container'])[2]/div[@class='c-virtual_list__item'][last()]' contains text 'This command can't be used by guests in this workspace.'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.arg: Pahoittelut, @Vieras Testikäyttäjä. Olet vieraskäyttäjä tässä Slack-työtilassa, joten et voi käyttää tätä bottia.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element '//div[@data-qa='app_home_bk_app_view']/*' contains text 'Pahoittelut, @Vieras Testikäyttäjä. Olet vieraskäyttäjä tässä Slack-työtilassa, joten et voi käyttää tätä bottia.'.

kw.name: Element Should Not Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` does not contain text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element '//div[@data-qa='app_home_bk_app_view']/*' does not contain text 'Tiedot päivitetty'.

kw.name: Page Should Not Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is not found on the current page.
kw.msg: Current page does not contain element '//div[@data-qa='app_home_bk_app_view']//button'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
